lead_paragraph: Russia has reduced the budget for the 2018 World Cup by almost $80 million, less than five months after the sports minister ruled out further spending cuts.

headline.print_headline: Russia Cuts World Cup Budget Again After Economic Pressure
headline.main: Russia Cuts World Cup Budget Again After Economic Pressure

snippet: Russia has reduced the budget for the 2018 World Cup by almost $80 million, less than five months after the sports minister ruled out further spending cuts....
